titles.title: To require the Commissioner of Social Security to make publicly available online tools to allow individuals eligible for disability benefits to assess the impact of earnings on the individual's eligibility for, and amount of, benefits received through Federal and State benefit programs.
Social Security Online Tools Innovation Act of 2018
Social Security Online Tools Innovation Act of 2018
Social Security Online Tools Innovation Act
Social Security Online Tools Innovation Act
Social Security Online Tools Innovation Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 115-932.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 723.

bill.summary:
Social Security Online Tools Innovation Act
This bill requires the Social Security Administration to make available, within two years, online tools that allow individuals who are eligible for disability benefits under the Social Security Act to assess the impact of earnings on their eligibility for federal and state benefits.
